content: Enter the port number for your LDAP server.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a tooltip that helps users understand what value they should enter when configuring their LDAP server connection in the application. The tooltip explains that it's the port number for the LDAP server. It appears on-screen next to a label field where the user will input this value.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'أدخل رقم البوابة لدليل LDAP' is a literal translation of 'Enter the port number for your LDAP server'. While understandable, a more natural phrasing in Arabic would be preferred. 'بوابة' (bawabah) directly translates to 'gateway' which isn't the common understanding of a port number in this context.  A more suitable term is 'منفذ' (manfath).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: أدخل رقم المنفذ لخادم LDAP الخاص بك.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ໃສ່ເລກີບອກຈຸດຂອງເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP ຂອງທ່ານ' is a literal translation and doesn't quite convey the intended meaning in a natural Lao way. It's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ປ້ອນຈຸດປະສົງຂອງເຄື່ອງແມ່ຂ່າຍ LDAP ຂອງທ່ານ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ໃສ່' (sai) while generally correct, might be better replaced with 'ປ້ອນ' (pon) which more closely aligns with 'enter' in a technical context.
The word 'සේවකයේ' (sewakayē) is a slightly awkward phrasing. While technically correct, it sounds less natural. A more common and smoother phrasing would be 'සේවය' (sewaya).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබේ LDAP සේවය පෝට් අංකය ඇතුළත් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Унесите име порта за ваш LDAP сервер' literally translates to 'Enter the name of the port for your LDAP server.' It should be 'Enter the port number for your LDAP server.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Унесите број порта за ваш LDAP сервер.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Unesite ime porta za vaš LDAP server' is not accurate. 'Ime porta' literally translates to 'name of the port', which is not what is meant. The correct translation should convey the action of entering a port number.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Unesite broj porta za vaš LDAP server.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'port number' is better translated as 'port numarası' rather than 'bağlantı noktası numarasını'. While the latter is understandable, it's less idiomatic in Turkish for technical contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: LDAP sunucunuz için port numarası girin.
